scripts.blockchain:start: sudo nodeos -e -p eosio --contracts-console --http-server-address="0.0.0.0:8888" --access-control-allow-origin "*" --access-control-allow-headers "*" --access-control-allow-credentials true --plugin eosio::history_api_plugin --plugin eosio::chain_api_plugin 2>&1 | grep -v produce_block
scripts.bios: cd ./../../ && cleos set contract eosio ./build/contracts/eosio.bios -p eosio
scripts.token:deploy: cd ./../../ && cleos set contract eosio.token ./build/contracts/eosio.token -p eosio.token
scripts.token:create: cleos push action eosio.token create '["eosio", "1000000000.0000 EOS", 0, 0, 0]' -p eosio.token
scripts.credit:publisher: cleos push action eosio.token issue '["publisher", "100.0000 EOS", "GIFT" ]' -p eosio
scripts.balance:publisher: cleos get table eosio.token publisher accounts
scripts.currency:publisher: cleos get currency balance eosio.token publisher
scripts.accounts: npm-run-all --parallel account:create:eosio.token account:create:player account:create:thiscoin account:create:tester account:create:user account:create:publisher
scripts.deploy: cleos set contract thiscoin ./dapp dapp/thiscoin.wast dapp/thiscoin.abi
scripts.ping: cleos push action thiscoin whoami '[]' -p thiscoin
scripts.ping:tester: cleos push action thiscoin whoami '[]' -p tester
scripts.ping:whoami: cleos push action thiscoin whoami '[]' -p publisher
scripts.map:init:simple3: cleos push action thiscoin initmap '["4","5",[65536,65538,196609]]' -p thiscoin
scripts.action:coin:eos: cleos push action thiscoin initcoin '[4542291,"EOS","EOS.png"]]' -p thiscoin
scripts.action:coin:btc: cleos push action thiscoin initcoin '[4346947,"BTC","BTC.png"]]' -p thiscoin
scripts.action:coin:eth: cleos push action thiscoin initcoin '[4543560,"ETH","ETH.png"]]' -p thiscoin
scripts.action:coin:neo: cleos push action thiscoin initcoin '[5129551,"NEO","NEO.png"]]' -p thiscoin
scripts.action:coin:ltc: cleos push action thiscoin initcoin '[5002307,"LTC","LTC.png"]]' -p thiscoin
scripts.coins: npm-run-all --parallel action:coin:eos action:coin:btc action:coin:eth action:coin:neo action:coin:ltc
scripts.join:tester: cleos transfer tester thiscoin "0.01 EOS" 'join,4543560,1,1' -p tester
scripts.join:publisher: cleos transfer publisher thiscoin "0.01 EOS" 'join,4542291,2,1' -p publisher
scripts.join:user: cleos transfer user thiscoin "0.01 EOS" 'join,4542291,2,1' -p user
scripts.join:player: cleos transfer player thiscoin "0.01 EOS" 'join,4542291,2,1' -p player
scripts.table:coins: cleos get table thiscoin thiscoin coins -l 1000
scripts.table:cells: cleos get table thiscoin thiscoin cells -l 1000
scripts.table:players: cleos get table thiscoin thiscoin players -l 1000
scripts.first:run: npm-run-all wallet:unlock accounts bios token credit build deploy map:init:simple3 coins
